title: Chapter 1324 - A Tooth For A Tooth
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1324 - A Tooth For A Tooth

The fierce battle had reached the point that it was about time to decide a victor.

Yet for some reason, Mu Yun’an admitted defeat out of nowhere! This was entirely unexpected, and it caught the crowd completely off guard. 

They looked at each other, the atmosphere suddenly stifled and deathly silent.

Beneath the distant dome of heaven, Su Yi subtly inclined his head. “You can leave behind my trophies and go.”

His flesh was in tatters, and his wounds were severe. His entire body was bleeding.

But he wasn’t surprised by Mu Yun’an’s choice to admit defeat.

“The rules are the rules. I can at least lose with dignity.” Mu Yun’an took out a storage treasure and tossed it to the temple gates from afar.

“Brother Mu, why did you admit defeat?” someone couldn’t help but ask.

It was the question everyone was wondering about.

Mu Yun’an shook his head and didn’t explain.

This left many of the onlookers on the brink of madness. This had been a rare, unprecedented, startling battle, fierce and terrifying. If word got out, it’d shake the world.

Yet it had ended so anticlimactically!

Even if you’d hit them over the head, no one could have come up with a reason why Mu Yun’an would admit defeat despite his...
original_title: Chapter 1324 - A Tooth for a Tooth
